select patent_id,case_number,apply_number,apply_time,write_person,apply_person,create_person,patent_name,patent_schedule,patent_claim,patent_remarks from tb_patent where 1=1
AND case_number like CONCAT('%',#{caseNumber},'%')
AND apply_number like CONCAT('%',#{applyNumber},'%')
AND patent_Name like CONCAT('%',#{patentName},'%')
AND create_person like CONCAT('%',#{createPerson},'%')
AND patent_schedule like CONCAT('%',#{patentSchedule},'%')
AND apply_time like CONCAT('%',#{applyTime},'%')
AND patent_claim=#{patentClaim} AND patent_schedule="待认领"
order by case WHEN patent_schedule like '未审核%' then 1 WHEN patent_schedule like '未通过%' then 2 WHEN patent_schedule like '待认领%' then 3 WHEN patent_schedule like '编写中%' then 4 WHEN patent_schedule like '待提交%' then 5 WHEN patent_schedule like '已提交%' then 6 end asc,apply_time desc
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_patent SET write_person=#{writePerson},patent_schedule = "编写中",patent_claim="1" WHERE patent_id=#{patentId}

SELECT p.patent_id id, case_number, apply_number, apply_time, write_person, apply_person, create_person, patent_name, patent_schedule, patent_claim, patent_remarks, i.indicator_name, jbook_url FROM tb_patent p LEFT JOIN tb_indicator i ON p.patent_id = i.patent_id LEFT JOIN tb_jbook j ON j.jbook_patent_id = p.patent_id WHERE p.patent_id = #{patentId} AND j.jbook_view='1'
